sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
By the Lord Deputy and Council. Tyrconnel. Whereas several persons in the province of Ulster, and the town of Sligo, in this his Majesties kingdom, have entred into several associations, containing no less offence than high treason... Ireland. Lord Deputy (1687-1689 : Tyrconnel) Tyrconnel, Richard Talbot, Earl of, 1630-1691.
1 sheet ([1] p.]
Printed by Andrew Crook and Samuel Helsham, assignes of Benjamin Tooke ... ; for T.G. and are to be sold by Richard Baldwin, ... Dublin : And reprinted at London : 1689
Title from caption and first lines of text. Initial letter. Signed at end: A. Fytton. C. Granard. Lymerick. Bellewe. Will. Talbot. Tho. Newcomen. Rich. Hamilton. Fran. Plowden. "Licensed according to order, March 22 168⁸₉." Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======
